validated=(value)

REQUIRED summary: States whether the email addresses of custodians must have been validated for the message to be sent. remarks: If true, Microsoft HealthVault will ensure that only custodians with validated email addresses will be sent the message. Custodians with non-validated email addresses will be skipped. If no validated custodians are found, then an error will be returned. value is a String

[Source]
